statements: SELECT * FROM GamePatchNotes WHERE patch_id = 5;
SELECT patch_version, patch_date FROM GamePatchNotes WHERE patch_id > 3 ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT patch_description FROM GamePatchNotes WHERE patch_version LIKE 'v1.%';
SELECT * FROM GamePatchNotes ORDER BY patch_date ASC;
SELECT patch_id, patch_version FROM GamePatchNotes WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM GamePatchNotes WHERE patch_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT patch_id, patch_version FROM GamePatchNotes WHERE patch_id > 5 ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM GamePatchNotes WHERE patch_description LIKE '%bug%' ORDER BY patch_id ASC;
SELECT patch_version, patch_description FROM GamePatchNotes WHERE patch_version IN ('1.2','1.3') AND patch_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT patch_id, patch_version, patch_date FROM GamePatchNotes WHERE patch_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patch_version DESC, patch_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM game_patch_notes;
SELECT patch_version, release_date FROM game_patch_notes WHERE patch_version = '1.0';
SELECT update_version, update_date FROM game_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT id, patch_version, release_date FROM game_patch_notes WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM game_patch_notes WHERE patch_description LIKE '%bug%';
SELECT * FROM game_patch_notes WHERE patch_version = '1.0';
SELECT id, patch_version, release_date FROM game_patch_notes ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT update_version, update_date, update_description FROM game_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM game_patch_notes WHERE patch_description LIKE '%bug fixes%';
SELECT id, patch_version, release_date, patch_description FROM game_patch_notes WHERE patch_version LIKE '%2%';
SELECT * FROM game_patch_notes;
SELECT patch_version, release_date FROM game_patch_notes ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_team FROM esports_players WHERE player_team = 'Team A';
SELECT patch_version, patch_description FROM game_patch_notes WHERE patch_id = 3;
SELECT player_name, last_update_id FROM esports_players ORDER BY last_update_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_patch_notes ORDER BY patch_id DESC, release_date ASC;
SELECT patch_id, patch_version FROM game_patch_notes WHERE patch_version LIKE 'v%' AND patch_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM game_updates WHERE update_status = 'completed' ORDER BY update_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_team, update_description FROM esports_players JOIN game_updates ON esports_players.last_update_id = game_updates.update_id;
SELECT patch_id, release_date, patch_description FROM game_patch_notes WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01' AND release_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Developers;
SELECT patch_id, patch_version, patch_date FROM PatchNotes;
SELECT player_name, team_name, game_id FROM EsportsPlayers ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT developer_name, developer_email FROM Developers WHERE developer_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patch_version, notes FROM PatchNotes WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PatchNotes ORDER BY patch_date DESC, patch_version ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patch_id, patch_version, patch_date FROM PatchNotes WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT Developers.*, EsportsPlayers.player_name FROM Developers INNER JOIN EsportsPlayers ON Developers.developer_id = EsportsPlayers.player_id WHERE EsportsPlayers.team_name = 'TeamA';
SELECT patch_version, COUNT(update_id) AS total_updates FROM PatchNotes LEFT JOIN PatchUpdates ON PatchNotes.patch_id = PatchUpdates.patch_id GROUP BY patch_version ORDER BY total_updates DESC;

SELECT patch_version, update_date, update_description FROM PatchNotes JOIN PatchUpdates ON PatchNotes.patch_id = PatchUpdates.patch_id WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patch_notes;
SELECT id, patch_version, release_date FROM patch_notes WHERE patch_version = '1.2.0';
SELECT * FROM game_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT title_name, genre FROM game_titles WHERE genre = 'RPG' ORDER BY title_name ASC;
SELECT developer_name, role FROM developers WHERE role = 'Lead Developer';
SELECT * FROM patch_notes ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT id, patch_version FROM patch_notes WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01' AND notes LIKE '%bug%' ORDER BY patch_version;
SELECT title_name, genre FROM game_titles WHERE genre = 'RPG' ORDER BY title_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, salary FROM esports_players WHERE salary > 5000 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT developer_name, role FROM developers ORDER BY developer_name ASC, role DESC;
